**Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title:** Coastal Flooding – Risk Assessment for Adaptation and Disaster Mitigation

**Reference Number:** cb-5845-9733357

**Publication Date:** 2023-05-24

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-09 14:00:00 (Expired)

**Synopsis**
------------

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for a contract to develop a National Standard of Canada (NSC) for emergency flood protection barrier technologies. The contract is part of the Climate Resilient Built Environment Initiative funded by Infrastructure Canada.

**Project Description**
---------------------

The NRC requires a contractor to develop a NSC that will establish standardized hydraulic testing procedures and certification metrics for emergency flood protection barrier technologies in Canadian environments. The objective is to enable the incorporation of climate change considerations into regulatory instruments, including codes and standards for buildings and infrastructure.

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

* **Procurement Category:** Services (SRV)
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to Canadian and international contractors pursuant to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
